newsitem.title: USA: Noble to sell Canadian assets.
newsitem.headline: Noble to sell Canadian assets.

text.p: Noble Affiliates Inc said Friday it intends to dispose of all of its assets in Canada, which are controlled by its Samedan Oil of Canada Inc subsidiary.

The Canadian assets consist of proved reserves of 3.4 million barrels of oil and 26.6 billion cubic feet of natural gas as of December 31, 1996. Current daily production levels of the Canadian properties are some 1,350 barrels of oil and eight million cubic feet of gas.
